sections.text: An orchard bears fruit only at night. The fruit grants a single memory to those who eat it.

options.description: Pick a fruit to recover a lost memory.
Guard the orchard from poachers instead.

sections.text: The memory you retrieve is bittersweet and reveals a choice you once avoided.

options.description: Act on the memory and seek reconciliation.
Keep the memory private and move on.

sections.text: You fend off poachers and earn the orchard's trust; it offers you a single fruit as thanks.

options.description: Refuse and leave the orchard untouched.

sections.text: Reconciliation brings peace. The orchard's keeper blesses your path forward.
You carry the memory quietly. Life continues with a new, private clarity.
You leave the orchard untouched. Its secrets remain for another night.
